      public void registerDeliveryPerson(String id, String name, String email, String phone) throws com.abes.fdms.exception.DuplicateDeliveryPersonException

      Parameters:
      id - Delivery person ID
      name - Name
      email - Email
      phone - Phone number
      Throws:
      com.abes.fdms.exception.DuplicateDeliveryPersonException - if ID already exists
